item.description:
This is going to be what will hopefully be the first monthly games night at my place.

Games to be played will be decided on the day of, however, I have:


  • 1 deck of playing cards (michigan rummy, poker, 500, etc.)
  • Double Uno deck
  • Fluxx
  • Chrononauts
  • Scrabble
  • Collection of strategy games


If you have a favorite game that you'd like to play, feel free to bring it and teach everyone!

Games to begin as soon as enough people show up. I'll have some snacks available.
Evening will run from 7 to 10ish.
item.how_to_find_us: If you plan on coming, send me an email to get my phone number to coordinate getting into the building.
item.name: Games Night
